title: ChatGPT Can Help Doctors—and Hurt Patients
description: The chatbot is tempting physicians with its ability to spout medical information, but researchers warn against trusting AI with tough ethical decisions.

title: Facebook Made BuzzFeed, Then Killed It
description: The digital publisher grew fat off the back of Facebook’s fickle algorithm. Battered and bruised, it’s now going back to where it all began.
